Join ASA!
Lender Lists and School Code of Conduct Webex
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® (ASA) has designed an on-line training series to discuss some of the most pressing topics affecting financial aid.
Date and Time:
Tuesday 2/17/09 2:00 p.m. - 3:00 p.m. EST
Course Description: Join us February 17, 2009 at 2:00 pm EST via webex for an in-depth discussion on implementing the changes drafted into the Higher Education Act Reauthorization Bill. Our regulatory analysts will focus Preferred Lender Lists and School Codes of conduct. This session will include an opportunity for question and answers.
Who Should Attend
Any financial aid administrator interested in the most up to date information.
How to register or for additional information.
· Register Online: http://www.amsa.com/fap/training/index.cfm
· Email: send your name, phone number and enrollment details to training@amsa.com
· Phone: call the Training Department at (800) 999-9080, ext. 3099 (1-617-728-4200)
All American Student Assistance training events are offered free of charge.
